team.title: Managing Director
team.name: Fatih S.
team.bioHtml: Software Engineer • Founder @Proteams Information Technologies

jobs.title: Junior iOS Developer (Part time - Remote - 20 Hours pw)
jobs.description:
-- UK Based Candidates Only --

This is a remote job and you can apply and work from any where in UK. This could be suitable for uni students or someone wants to have experience in a real world projects)

We are looking for an Junior/Mid level iOS developer to work on our mobile application products using the latest versions of iOS and be able to show links to apps currently live in the iTunes App Store. Someone with a desire to learn new skills and enjoys keeping up to date with the latest technologies and researching how they can be used to address real world problems.

You can apply and work from any where in UK ( Remote working)

Key Skills

At least 1 year hands on experience working on iOS application development (personel/hobby projects are also considered)
Experience in iOS development with Swift on XCode
Excellent verbal / written communication skills
Desired Skills

Experience of using RESTful web services, and third-party API integration’s (Firebase and MapBox is a plus)
Experience in Git (GitHub)
Benefits

Holidays
Pension scheme
Flexible working hours (manage your own time) and working from home. You can manage your own time.
Have the freedom to experiment with the latest tech and help guide our mobile tech stack
Bespoke learning plans and training materials
